title: Bug 18268 not finding images and files in NL-specific subdirectories
description:
When attempting to open the about dialog in Eclipse, the main image is not displayed. This issue arises when following the steps below:

1. Start Eclipse
2. Delete <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/eclipselg.gif>
3. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=$nl$/eclipselg.gif'
4. Edit <install/eclipse/org.eclipse.platform2.0.0/about.ini> and change the value of the aboutImage property to 'aboutImage=nl/en/eclipselg.gif'
5. Open the about dialog

Upon observation, it is evident that the UI correctly passes the entire path to IPluginDescriptor.find, but the '$nl$' path segment is not handled correctly, resulting in the main image not being displayed.
OB: Open the about dialog and observe that the main image is not displayed.
EB: The UI should handle the '$nl$' path segment correctly and display the main image in the about dialog.
SR: Implement proper handling of the '$nl$' path segment in the UI to ensure that the main image is displayed correctly in the about dialog.
